 He smiled at him. "We are here to help you destroy as
many enimes as we can. TO pave the way. Magmatron will
return. His time is not yet set but we are here to
prepare the world for it. So do you have a base?"

> Afterburner: Yes, its been too long.
> Gigatron: So, whats the situation?
> ~~~~~
> ::The Destrocons arrive at Apocalypse's posititon::
> Ramjet: So, why has Magmatron sent you?
